newsitem.title: USA: Silgan sees credit facility completed Q3.
newsitem.headline: Silgan sees credit facility completed Q3.

text.p: Silgan Holdings Inc, a consumer goods packaging manufacturer, said Tuesday it expects a new $1.0 billion senior secured credit facility to be completed in the third quarter of the year.
The refinancing facility will reduce interest expense on its debt under the existing credit facility by approximately $8 million annually, it said.
It said lenders led by Bankers Trust Co have agreed, under a commitment letter, to use their best efforts to arrange a syndicate for the new facility.
